title: Pixel 3 loops cell / wifi loss after update
content:
After OTA update there is a problem with a phone: it looses wifi connection nearly every minute, if I turn whe wifi off and use only cell data, it looses network every 1-1.5 minutes.

I've already tried:
forget network and re-add id
use different wifi network, different frequency, different wifi security 
reset network data 
change network mode (LTE, 3g)
different sim-card
factory reset
flashing the previous firmwares
rebooted hundreds times

Even on clear install on the second step (after language choosing) it's still problem after wifi connection established: it just keeping dropping and restarting.

Any ideas how to fix it ?
